div.p: Carter Community Charter School is a public charter school serving grades K-8 where our passion for education is at the heart of everything we do.
Click here to download the Carter Community School uniform order form.
Start the application process online and make the first steps to enrolling your student.
We are committed to our relationships with students and parents. Our student/parent portal is coming soon.

Carter Community Charter School, Inc. of Durham, North Carolina, is a creative and innovative learning environment where our dedication to the children is at the heart of everything that we do. Our teachers and staff members seek engaging ways to inspire our students through enriching learning experiences that promote our core objective of developing productive, responsible individuals who demonstrate strong academic growth, leadership, community service, and citizenship.
